description: If you're looking for more space or a fresh start, Towns at Lynn could be the perfect fit. Our townhomes feature three full bedrooms, plenty of storage and an open main floor to bring everyone together. A large patio extends your living space for hosting family time and celebrations. You'll have direct-to-home parkade access, fully covered for loading gear in any weather. All residents get access to the Lynn Club-a 10,000 sf indoor and outdoor clubhouse including an indoor pool, a fitness centre, the Mountain Lounge, a kids' playground and an outdoor dining area available from the day you move in.  A Better Home by Mosaic - get in touch with our Towns at Lynn team to learn more.
